title: Bubble Shack Hawaiian Waters Ocean Bliss Body Lotion, 8oz

Handmade in Hawaii, 100% vegan lotion, sulfate, paraben and phthalate free
Hawaiian Waters Ocean Bliss: You'll feel like you've taken a plunge into the deep turquoise waters of the Pacific.
